item.title: [MAHOUT-138] Convert main() methods to use Commons CLI for argument processing
item.description: Commons CLI is in the classpath and makes it much easier to handle command line args and they are more self-documenting when done right. We should convert our main methods to use CLI
item.summary: Convert main() methods to use Commons CLI for argument processing

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
